The Sunflower preschool located here have nice Teachers and always put on smiling face. They are strictly following the policy to keep young children safe and healthy. Teacher do their  100% way to teach and guide the young ones.
Teachers also listen to parents worries and share some tips on how to guide the young ones.
The school practice good children and parents collaboration.

Like to Specially thanks teacher Joy and Wang and all the teachers being very patience with all the childrens.

It has been great consolation to us as parents when we know that they are in good hands. I'm not sure why the reviews are so negative, but personally, I like the school and the teachers. While they may seem firm and stern, their love for the kids is genuine. You can see it in the way they pay attention to small details.

My daughter has had severe separation anxiety even after 6 months, but whenever I peek into the school, I always see a teacher carrying her or comforting her.

What I really appreciate about the school is its culture. They encourage older students to interact with the younger ones, and you can see the older students showing affection to the younger ones.

I want to sincerely thank Teacher Michelle Wang Lao Shi, Teacher Efa, Teacher Cynthia, and especially Rong Rong Lao Shi, who has since ended her contract.

To anyone reading the negative comments, I suggest going for a school tour and observing for yourself. It's not as bad as some comments make it seem.
Highly recommend school
